pages.text: The Rite of the $(marked)Golden Flock$() is used to actively convert $(marked)Villagers$() into $(l:miskatonicmysteries:bestiary/serfs)$(marked)Yellow Serfs$().$(br2)You must be initiated into the ways of $(l:miskatonicmysteries:goo/hastur)$(marked)the Yellow King$() to cast this.

pages.obfuscated_text: The humanoids must have their minds melt for it to be reshaped
pages.text: The converted Villager must be under the effect of $(marked)Mania$(), best achieved with the $(l:miskatonicmysteries:rites/hysteria)$(marked)Hysteria$() Rite.
